title: Choosing tests
text: The statistic being tested is the single standard deviation concerned.

title: Choosing tests
text: To test variability, use the chi-square test of a single variance. The test may be left-, right-, or two-tailed, and its hypotheses are always expressed in terms of the variance (or standard deviation).

title: Test of a Single Variance
text: The doctor is testing if the variances are different than what was originally thought, so this is a test of a single variance test.
